DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare 6-month treatment outcome 15-21 year old opioid-dependent youth receiving extend release naltrexone ( XR-NTX ) v. Treatment Usual ( TAU ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This propose study 6-month , two-group randomized clinical trial XR-NTX v. TAU 340 opioid-dependent youth age 15-21 . The study conduct Mountain Manor Treatment Center , community drug treatment program Baltimore . TAU consist buprenorphine treatment opioid withdrawal follow counsel without continued buprenorphine .
